basic.name: Groundbreaker (Q)
basic.description: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.5 seconds and then Slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Bloodthirst (W)
basic.description: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

basic.name: Wrecking Ball (E)
basic.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

basic.name: Into the Fray (?)
basic.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 20 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

heroic.name: Warlord's Challenge (R)
heroic.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Decimate (R)
heroic.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.Stores up to 3 charges.

trait.name: Armor Up (T)
trait.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

1.name: Warbreaker
1.description: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Unrivaled Strength
1.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.

1.name: Body Check
1.description: Activate to deal 111 damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.

4.name: In For the Kill
4.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

4.name: Thirst for Battle
4.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

4.name: Indomitable
4.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Intimidation
7.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Oppressor
7.description: Basic Attacks and Bloodthirst against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Lok-tar ogar!
7.description: Increase Into the Fray's Armor by 20. Hitting enemy Heroes with Into the Fray reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

10.name: Warlord's Challenge
10.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

10.name: Decimate
10.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.Stores up to 3 charges.

13.name: Defensive Measures
13.description: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 Shield for 6 seconds.

13.name: Bloodcraze
13.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Up
13.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Mortal Combo
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.

16.name: Earthshaker
16.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Seasoned Soldier
16.description: Gain 5% maximum Health, increase Groundbreaker's Slow duration by 1 second, and Bloodthirst gains an additional charge.

20.name: Death Wish
20.description: Increase the duration of Warlord's Challenge by 0.5 seconds.  If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

20.name: Deadly Calm
20.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titanic Might
20.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

20.name: Inner Rage
20.description: Body Check gains an additional charge and its healing reduction is increased by an additional 45%.
